Jubbly bird
Release15 March 2006 (Update)

A jubbly is a large purplish version of a Chompy bird found during the Skrach Uglogwee subquest of the Recipe for Disaster quest. Jubblies are used in Creature Creation. They can also be hunted for several achievements, including the Chompy Massacre as each jubbly will count as one chompy in the kill count. They can only be killed using ogre bows or ogre comp bows. Having ogre bellows and one ball of wool is a requirement for hunting and killing jubblies.

Contents

  • 1 Hunting jubblies
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100% drops
    • 2.2 Main drop
    • 2.3 Universal drops
  • 3 Achievements
  • 4 Graphical updates
  • 5 Update history
  • 6 Trivia

Hunting jubblies[edit | edit source]

Jubblies are not particularly hard to hunt. A good spot to hunt them is just to the east of the Gnome glider, south east of the Castle Wars arena, in the Feldip Hills.

  1. Use the ogre bellows which has been loaded with swamp gas on a swamp toad. This creates a bloated toad.
  2. Mine the Feldip swamp rocks nearby to obtain rock ores. The rock ores will be used up during baiting.
  3. Use the gas-loaded ogre bellows again on an already bloated toad, with the rock ores and a ball of wool in the inventory. This creates a balloon toad. Create as many balloon toads as required.
    • Note that only one ball of wool is required, as it can be reused.
  4. Place the balloon toad on the ground nearby as bait, and wait for the jubbly to appear.

Once the balloon toad has been placed, the jubblies have a chance to appear nearby. They may not appear at all, and this causes the balloon toad to deflate and disappear from the ground. If this happens, try again. They do not actually attack and can be killed safely using an ogre bow or an ogre comp bow. Once they are killed, they must be plucked to receive the drops. The feathers go into the inventory automatically, while the other drops appear on the ground. Cooking the raw jubbly on the ogre spit-roast north of Rantz results in a cooked jubbly.

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • Chompy Massacre ( 50) – Kill chompy birds. (X/4,000)
  • Nice to Meat You ( 20) – Sample all of the listed meat dishes.
    • Cooked jubbly
  • Guardian of the Realm ( 0) – Obtained a collection of unique drops from Slayer monsters located within Asgarnia & Misthalin.
    • Cornucopia drop

  • Jubbly bird after 15 March 2006 (update)

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • ninja 18 July 2016 (Update):
    • Allowed use of abilities on chompy and jubbly birds.
  • patch 22 November 2012 (Update):
    • It is once again possible to attack Jubbly birds.
  • patch 16 June 2009 (Update):
    • Prevented certain bubbles in the Feldip Hills from blocking Ranged attacks when hunting chompies and jubbly chompies.
  • update 15 March 2006 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • It is possible to use Monster Examine on this monster, which states that it has a max hit of 32. Despite this, it is unable to attack the player.
  • Its weakness is stab, however, it is impossible to use melee attacks on this monster.
  • If a balloon toad is placed correctly, a jubbly bird may appear and land inside the Castle Wars wall, near the ivy on the southern wall.
